scripts.logs:link: bash -lc 'set -e; REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd); cd "$REPO_ROOT"; mkdir -p services/arb-mm/data/reports/phoenix services/arb-mm/data/reports/amms services/arb-mm/data/reports/arb; rm -rf packages/phoenix/logs && ln -s ../../services/arb-mm/data/reports/phoenix packages/phoenix/logs; rm -rf packages/amms/logs && ln -s ../../services/arb-mm/data/reports/amms packages/amms/logs; rm -rf services/arb-mm/logs && ln -s ../data/reports/arb services/arb-mm/logs'
scripts.logs:clean: bash -lc 'set -e; REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd); cd "$REPO_ROOT"; rm -rf services/arb-mm/services services/arb-mm/packages services/arb-mm/logs services/arb-mm/events-*.jsonl'
scripts.//_hooks: ──────────── Keep symlinks correct before local runs ────────────
